column3: 中共中央秘密电台旧址
column9: 中共中央秘密电台旧址位于慕尔鸣路兴庆里17号（今茂名北路111弄11号），系砖木结构新式里弄二层楼房建筑，总面积约58平方米。1930年冬，领导组建中共无线电通信工作的中央特科的李强在此设立中共中央地下秘密电台。由吴克坚出面租赁，然后又以二房东的身份把楼上租给毛齐华、潘材珍夫妇，把亭子间租给曾三。吴克坚负责经济、政治工作，曾三、毛齐华负责报务工作，电台建立与共产国际及苏区的通信联系。1931年2月，慕尔鸣路地下秘密电台转移至泥城桥鸿福里（今新闸路66弄）。
column10: The central committee of the communist party of China, the secret radio site in moulmein road in xingqing 17 (now maoming road, lane 111 11), two-story buildings are brick structure new lanes, with a total area of 58 square meters. The winter of 1930, the leadership to form the communist party of China central turco li qiang in the radio communication work to set up the central committee of the communist party of China secret underground station. By Wu Kejian to lease, and then to the identity of the principal lodger lease the upstairs, Pan Caizhen Mao Ji China couple, three lease the garret. Wu Kejian responsible for economic, political, once three, Mao Ji responsible for radio, radio set up a correspondence with the communist international and Soviet area. In February 1931, transferred to the mud moulmein road underground secret radio city bridge in great luck or blessing (now XinZha road 66).

column3: 中共崇明县委机关旧址
column6: 竖新镇油车桥东首城隍庙内
column9: 中共崇明县委机关位于竖新镇油车桥东首城隍庙内。1927年11月，崇明的共产党组织在遭严重破坏之后，党的活动中心即向东转移到油车桥一带。1929年秋，中共崇明县临委改为中共崇明县委，县委书记俞成全，机关设在油车桥东首城隍庙。在中共崇明县委领导下，油车桥成立农民协会和小车夫工会，轰轰烈烈开展减租和工人要求加薪等斗争。1929年12月，中共崇明县委在油车桥机关内召开会议，重组县委，由俞保元任书记。县委重建后，全县党员发展到67人。1995年，崇明县人民政府为中共崇明县委机关旧址挂牌。
column10: Organs of the communist party of chongming county is located in the vertical new town gasoline destination within the first the city god temple. In November 1927, the communist party group in chongming was severely damaged, the party's activity center is shifting eastward to the axle of oil area. In the autumn of 1929, the Chinese communist party for chongming county party committee to the Chinese communist party, the county party committee secretary YuChengQuan, authorities in a gasoline destination first). Established under the leadership of the CPC chongming county, oil axle association of farmers and small pullers unions, vigorous to develop incentives and workers to ask for a raise, etc. In December 1929, the communist party of chongming county within the oil axle authority held a meeting, restructuring the county, by YuBaoYuan as secretary. Rebuilt the county, the county party members to 67. In 1995, for the people's government as chongming county authority site of the Chinese communist party.

column9: 野风画会旧址位于西江湾路476弄24号。该画会是中国左翼美术家联盟领导下成立的美术团体，由木刻讲习会学员顾鸿干、倪焕之等于1932年创办。画会的名称取自诗句野火烧不尽、春风吹又生，象征着不屈不挠的革命斗争精神。鲁迅对画会的成立非常关心，特意邀请蔡元培为画会题写招牌作为保护。野风画会成立之际，正是九一八事变之后抗日救亡运动风起云涌之时，画会的会员们也踊跃创作抗日题材作品，受到社会的关注。画会旧址的建筑尚存，现为民居。

Painting can exist, site building now houses.

column9: 省吾中学旧址位于曹家渡长宁支路125弄。省吾中学是由中共上海地下党于1945年抗战胜利前夕创办的一所革命据点学校，担负掩护党的工作、保存和发展党的力量、开展革命教育活动、传播革命思想等多项任务，为迎接上海的解放作出了巨大贡献。在共产党的领导下，省吾中学参与创办工人夜校、举行秘密会议和入党宣誓仪式，并成为中共上海沪西区委统一编印的《新华通讯》（工人版）的秘密刻写处。省吾中学于1958年7月迂往武定西路1251弄20号新址后，此处为长宁支路第二小学校址。2008年3月，省吾中学被公布为长宁区爱国主义教育基地。
column10: Our school site is located in cao cao changning branch 125 lane. Save my high school is on the eve of the victory of the war in 1945 by the Chinese communist party Shanghai underground party founded a school for revolutionary stronghold, cover the party's work, preservation and development of the power of the party, to carry out revolutionary education activities, spread of revolutionary ideas, such as multiple tasks, for the people have made great contributions to the liberation of Shanghai. Under the leadership of the communist party, save my high school night classes, co-founded workers held secret meetings and to join the party swearing-in ceremony, and become the Chinese communist party Shanghai west district party committee unified) xinhua communication secret carving (workers). In March 2008, was released as a my school of changning district of patriotism education bases.

column3: 江苏省委机关暨瞿秋白旧居遗址
column9: 江苏省委机关暨瞿秋白旧居原位于南京西路646弄（今南京西路688号一带）。1933年6月，瞿秋白因工作需要搬到这里居住。当时，冯雪峰任省委宣传部部长，通讯社暂交瞿秋白管理。当时因不便在外露面，瞿秋白与夫人暂时与冯雪峰同住，以便冯雪峰帮他做联络工作。不到两个月，江苏省委机关被敌人发觉。于是瞿秋白、杨之华搬到鲁迅家暂住，冯雪峰则临时租住在静安寺路（今南京西路）静安别墅。原址已拆除。
column10: Jiangsu provincial authorities and qu qiubai former home is located in nanjing west road 646, lane (now nanjing west road no. 688 area). In June 1933, qu qiubai because of work need to move to live here. At that time, xue-feng feng ren secretary of provincial party committee propaganda department, news agency pay qu qiubai management. At that time because of inconvenience in the outside appearance, qu qiubai and his wife temporarily living with xue-feng feng, xue-feng feng to help him do to the liaison work. Less than two months, the jiangsu provincial party committee authority was found by the enemy. So qu qiubai, moved to LuXunJia Yang Zhihua stay, xue-feng feng temporarily rented in jing an temple road (now nanjing west road) jing 'an villas. The site has been removed.

column3: 九三学社在沪社员座谈会暨北京东路缫丝业同业公会旧址
column9: 九三学社在沪社员座谈会暨北京东路缫丝业同业公会旧址位于北京东路360弄5号。1947年7月，孟宪章在《大公报》发表《急管哀弦愈逼愈紧的日本问题》文章07月下旬，九三学社上海分社主任、上海缫丝业同业公会理事长褚辅成，在北京东路360弄5号缫丝业公会召集九三学社在沪社员孟宪章、孙荪荃等进行座谈，认为美国扶植日本法西斯势力是中国的最大隐忧。为扩大爱国影响，他们决定发起成立对日问题座谈会，开展反美扶日运动。
column10: Jiusan society membership seminar in Shanghai and Beijing east road SaoSiYe association site is located in Beijing east road 360, lane number five. In July 1947, xian-zhang meng published in da gong bao urgent pipe cry of string forced tight probability of Japan's problems, the article in late July, director of the local branch of the jiusan society, Shanghai SaoSiYe, chairman of the board of trade, ChuFu SaoSiYe council convened in Beijing east road 360, lane 5 jiusan society membership xian-zhang meng, Sun Sunquan in Shanghai and so on carries on the discussion, thought the us-installed Japanese fascist forces is one of China's biggest concern. To expand the patriotic, they decided to launch a problem for symposium, carry out anti-american rotary day campaign.

column3: 白鹤镇新四军标语墙旧址
column9: 青浦区白鹤镇新四军标语墙旧址位于白鹤镇陈岳村（今塘湾村）内。1945年，新四军浙东部队奉命北撤，在谭启龙的率领下，于当年10月13日，路经旧青浦镇时，书写标语两条。一条内容是巩固国内团结，保证国内和平，另一条内容是我们要和平，反对内战。这两条标语曾被国民党当局以纸筋石灰涂没，后经风吹雨淋，石灰渐渐脱落，标语字迹重现。1961年、1962年文物部门曾两度．加固墙壁，组织人员维修。由于长期风化，标语字迹模糊，墙壁已成为危墙。1972年，青浦县博物馆按照原貌翻建围墙，重制标语。1990年4月，上海市文管会对该房屋加筑石驳，加固墙壁。翌年，青浦县博物馆在此竖保护标志。1959年，公布为青浦县文物保护单位。
column10: Town new slogan wall site is located in the qingpu crane crane town Chen Yue village (now pond bay village). In 1945, in the east of the new fourth army troops have been ordered to withdraw north, under the leadership of the Tan Qilong, on October 13, through the old town of qingpu, the words of two. A content is strengthen national unity and ensure internal peace, the other content is we want peace, against civil war. These two signs the paper tendons lime had been the kuomintang authorities to besmear, after the wind rain, lime gradually fall off, the slogan writing again. In 1961, 1962, the cultural relics department twice. Reinforced wall, organize personnel to repair. Due to long-term weathering and slogan blur, the wall has become a dangerous wall. In 1972, renovated in accordance with the original walls, qingpu museum remakes slogan. In April 1990, Shanghai tube to raise this building stone barge, reinforce walls. The following year, the qingpu museum up protection sign here. Published in 1959, as the qingpu cultural relics protection unit.
